archimate:ArchimateModel.name: CSC-Patterns
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
# CSC Patterns Library Welcome to the patterns library of the Cyber Security Coalition Belgium!
In this library, coalition members publish security patterns in the ArchiMate modeling language. This allows the reader to explore the security patterns library in an Archi model or in an HTML export environment.
## Using the Library For the security patterns themselves, check out the "Patterns" folder (under "Views"). In this folder patterns are organized into subfolders which contain the relevant pattern views. Contributors additionally make use of properties to add meta-data to patterns, just click "Properties" under a view to access this information.
For general background and supporting views, check out the "Background" folder (under "Views").
To return to the homepage, go to "properties"->"homepage" on this page.
